Salesforce Components - AdjustmentTrigger
Overview    Classes    Enums    Interfaces    Triggers    SObjects    Groups    Index




Trigger AdjustmentTrigger

trigger AdjustmentTrigger on Adjustment__c (
  before insert,
  after insert,
  before update,
  after update,
  before delete,
  after delete,
  after undelete
)

Description: Handles adjustment trigger actions References:
